long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your ChatGPT experience with Seeker, the Chrome extension that allows you to effortlessly search through your past conversations. With Seeker, you can save and search your ChatGPT chats, keeping all data private and stored locally in your browser. Find specific information quickly and easily with our dedicated search interface.

Key Features:

- Save Conversations on Demand: Only save your ChatGPT conversations when you click the "Extract Chat" button.
- Local Storage for Privacy: All your data is stored locally in your browser, ensuring your privacy.
- Powerful Search Interface: Easily search through your saved conversations to find specific content.
- Organized Conversations: View a list of all saved conversations with timestamps for easy reference.
